description.narrative: The United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP27) will be held from 7-18 November 2022 in Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt. Within the framework of COP 27, UNIDO will co-host a #H2 Day#, in collaboration with the Government of Egypt and EU partners. The event is expected to take place on 10 November 2022, within the context of the International World Science Day for Peace and Development. The event will convene heads of state and the leadership of private sector and international organizations to accelerate the deployment of green hydrogen (GH2) in industry of developing countries. It will explore the contribution that GH2 can make to the realization of mid-century net-zero objectives and decarbonization of industry. It will address the existing and multifaceted gaps that slow down GH2 in industry. Discussions will evolve around new pathways, barriers, and key actions required to accelerate the deployment of GH2 for industry.
